messages.title: Lesley Rollings - the best choice for our next MP
messages.content: Lesley believes passionately in fairness, whether that means making sure young people get a decent start in life, that everyone is treated equally, or that we all have the right to live in a warm and comfortable home.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Lesley is committed to ensuring fairness, with focus on young people's start in life, equal treatment for all, and right to a warm and comfortable home.

housing.content: the right to live in a warm and comfortable home

leaflet.personalStatement: Lesley believes passionately in fairness, whether that means making sure young people get a decent start in life, that everyone is treated equally, or that we all have the right to live in a warm and comfortable home.

images.caption: Lesley listening to a seated elderly woman
Lesley and two other people in a semi-rural setting with a dog

leaflet.additionalNotes: Next General Election: Lib Dem 28% / Conservative 49% / Labour 14% / Others 9% - Indicates a tactical voting situation.
